# Forest analytics consulting 

Arbor Custom Analytics LLC offers data and analytics consulting services to forestry companies and organizations. Browse [our company slidedeck](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1-X-e4OuPv2gTmJQuBM0tVkH6U44o5okYTm7f1qhi9lE/edit?usp=sharing) for more info.  
 
## Specializations include:
* Forest analytics 
* Forest carbon assessment
* Forest growth and yield modeling 
* Forest Vegetation Simulator modeling and scenario analysis
* Statistical modeling
* Short courses and workshops for forest and natural resource professionals
* Independent research
